name: DEVOID (AnizyArt)
description:
When a human moves into a new apartment, they decide to explore the area to meet their new neighbours. But they must be careful as the building is not all as it seems.

DEVOID is a visual novel with point and click elements created in Ren'Py. Navigate through this building and meet your new neighbours. Be careful not to get trapped.

This was inspired by liminal spaces and photots of places you've seen in your nightmares. I wanted to try and replicate that calm, melancholy feeling while interacting with the environment. Although parts might look creepy, it's not intended as a horror game, but more mysterious and strange.

Play time is around 5-15 minutes depending on how fast you read or go through the options.

The gameplay is simple with a linear story. It has 11 endings (10 bad endings and 1 true ending).

Credits:
  • Story/code/art by AnizyArt
  • Music from Loyalty Freak Music
  • Sound effects from Soundly

Thanks for looking at my short visual novel!
